pkgmetadata.longdescription: SmoothGNOME is a GNOME theme that attempts to make a nicer default looking desktop. It only uses colors from the GNOME HIG palette, and so it interfaces well with the default set of icons. It makes use of the Smooth GTK+ engine. SmoothGNOME provides a Metacity theme, 6 GTK+ themes, a GNOME metatheme, and an icon theme.
